intro: When communication fails. I'm the shield that takes the blast for others.

post.body: Hello ZeroMe! Everyone has dark stories. Not everyone talks about them. Rape, family violance, etc. I'm not ordinary. Many people who are on Zero. Probably aren't ordanary. So it does not matter. Anyway, I'm inbound and almost ready for total shutdown. Life has many things i don't want to be a part of. Instead i'll shut off the world. And be to service within the epic world of decentral shit! WELCOME TO MY WORLD!
